Comment: 오늘은 강수량을 인위적으로 늘리려는 인간의 시도에 관한 에피소드가 재미있습니다.
EnglishComment: For today, the episode about attempt to incrase precipitation artificially is interesting to watch.

Themes.Theme: The stage is set for meetings and drama at this year's Group of 20 (G20) summit in Argentina.
How scientists try to increase precipitation through cloud seeding.
